item.title: My First Outing With Dapr
item.description: TL;DR: Not as forgiving as I’d have liked … Challenge #1 This took a little longer than I’d have liked! I was using the internal DNS to resolve the port of my redis service. My Redis single instance was deployed via a deployment manifest, along with a LoadBalancer Service - purely to give me remote access. I’d first create a secret, by typing: $ kubectl create secret generic db-passwords --from-literal=redis-password='<password>' This is the deployment manifest:
